org.springframework.aop.framework
Interface MethodPointcut

All Known Subinterfaces:
DynamicMethodPointcut, StaticMethodPointcut
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMethodPointcut
public interface MethodPointcut

Interface to be implemented by objects that can cause conditional invocation of an Interceptor depending on the method, arguments and attributes passed.

Since:
03-Apr-2003
Version:
